programme.title: Ike chega à puberdade, mas Kyle se preocupa com o fato de que ele e seu irmão menor estão se distanciando. Dessa forma, Kyle o leva a uma apresentação ao vivo de seu programa de TV favorito.
programme.desc: South Park

programme.title: Cartman facilita a paz mundial com sua última brincadeira, o que leva os líderes religiosos a South Park para testemunhar o acontecimento de uma profecia bíblica.
programme.desc: South Park

programme.title: Kyle não entende por que Ike e seus amigos querem ver as pessoas comentar sobre coisas acontecendo, em vez de experimentá-la por si mesmos. Enquanto isso, Randy tem que apresentar ao vivo para fazer algum dinheiro.
programme.desc: South Park

programme.title: O Parceiro do Diabo, (1971, Western)
programme.desc: Clay Lomax é um assaltante de banco que foi traído e ferido por seu parceiro, e por isso foi condenado a oito anos de prisão.

programme.title: Meu Nome é Ninguém, (1975, Western)
programme.desc: O honesto advogado Black Jack Gideon envolve-se na procura de um valioso e raro pônei japonês, que foi sequestrado, e por quem o bando de desertores renegados exige uma fabulosa quantia de resgate.

programme.title: Django, (1966, Western)
programme.desc: Um pistoleiro carregando um caixão, entra em uma cidade que tem duas facções em guerra, o KKK e uma gangue de bandidos mexicanos. Esse é Django e ele se envolve em uma luta contra os dois lados.

programme.title: O Irresistível Forasteiro, (1958, Western)
programme.desc: Um estranho em uma cidade de gado ocidental se comporta com notável autoconfiança, estabelecendo-se como um homem a ser respeitado.

programme.title: Os Abutres Têm Fome, (1970, Western)
programme.desc: Nesta aventura desenfreada e anárquica que se desenrola no México do século XIX, o mercenário americano Hogan salva a freira Sara dos seus pretensos molestadores.

programme.title: Terra Bruta, (1961, Western)
programme.desc: Pela primeira vez, o lendário John Ford une-se à estrela James Stewart em - Terra Bruta, que relata a história tensa e emocionante de dois homens da lei que invadem o território dos Comanches para resgatar reféns cativos da tribo.

programme.title: Por uns Dólares a Mais, (1965, Western)
programme.desc: Monco é um astuto caçador de recompensas, que perambula pelas cidades do velho oeste americano em busca de um novo alvo.

programme.title: Que Assim Seja, Trinity, (1974, Western)
programme.desc: Um aventureiro protege um garoto que herdou um terreno sob o qual há um rico campo de petróleo. O menino é ameaçado por vilões perigosos que querem prejudicá-lo e tomar a terra.

programme.title: A Pistola é Minha Bíblia, (1968, Western)
programme.desc: Após um violento assalto a uma diligência, com muitos tiros e ação explosiva, dois pistoleiros Tim e Larry, aparecem do nada, sem nenhuma informação sobre seu passado.

programme.title: Assassinos de Aluguel, (2013, Action)
programme.desc: Inspirado na história real de um escândalo que envolveu presidiários sendo liberados por um dia para trabalharem como assassinos de aluguel para políticos corruptos.

programme.title: Teia De Crimes, (2021, Drama)
programme.desc: O xerife Alden Rockwell está se preparando para uma aposentadoria indesejada até que seu velho amigo de guerra e xerife vizinho, Clint, é misteriosamente baleado. Imediatamente a esposa de Clint pressiona Alden para investigar o tiroteio.

programme.title: Apartamento 3D - O mal mora ao lado, (2014, Thriller)
programme.desc: Tudo parece perfeito para Erin e Ben depois que eles se mudam para um novo apartamento em Nova York, até que um estranho fica obcecado por eles.

programme.title: Interligados, (2018, Thriller)
programme.desc: Um homem, que se culpa pela morte da sua filha única, retorna à cidade onde o fatídico acidente ocorreu. Lá, ele conhece uma bela e misteriosa mulher. Ambos sentem-se atraídos um pelo outro, mas ela também carrega um passado sombrio.

programme.title: Intermediário.com, (2009, Drama)
programme.desc: Baseado em uma história real. O empresário Jack Harris tem uma linda família e uma carreira de sucesso, recuperando empresas problemáticas. Até que ele conhece Wayne Beering e Buck Dolby, uma dupla que atua com pornografia na internet.

programme.title: O Prisioneiro, (2023, Drama)
programme.desc: Dylan deixou seu passado sombrio de crimes e encontrou o amor de sua vida, Maria. Agora ele trabalha como pescador em águas abertas, mas o diretor da prisão local tem outros planos.

programme.title: Jogo da Sobrevivência, (2014, Thriller)
programme.desc: Baseado em uma história real. Reagan, uma estrela do atletismo, é sequestrada por uma dupla de sociopatas depois que seu carro quebra em uma estrada deserta para a liberdade.

programme.title: A Cura de Todo Mal, (1949, Drama)
programme.desc: Johnny é um carismático pregador, que viaja ao lado de sua namorada por todos os Estados Unidos, visitando igrejas e enganando as pessoas ao dizer que possui poderes de cura, até o dia em que ele descobre que os seus poderes são reais.

programme.title: Tempestade de Gelo, (2023, Action)
programme.desc: Quando uma tempestade de inverno atinge a Carolina do Norte com a menor temperatura já registrada na história, os climatologistas começam uma corrida contra o tempo para salvar o máximo de vidas possíveis antes que o país inteiro vire gelo.

programme.title: O Assassino do Central Park, (2017, Slashers and Serial Killers)
programme.desc: Seis melhores amigos do ensino médio se reúnem para uma noite de diversão no Central Park. O que eles ainda não sabem é que um assassino mascarado está à solta no local, apenas esperando para colocar o seu plano de vingança em prática.

programme.title: Necrotério, (2006, Zombies)
programme.desc: Uma brincadeira de estudantes universitários se torna mortal quando descobrem que um diretor de funerária pode ter sido libertado de um manicômio um pouco cedo demais.

programme.title: Tubarões de Gelo, (2016, Science fiction)
programme.desc: Uma nova raça de tubarões vorazes e agressivos racha o fundo do oceano congelado de uma estação de pesquisa do Ártico, devorando todos os que caem.

programme.title: Dia dos Mortos, (1985, Horror Classics)
programme.desc: Enquanto o mundo é tomado por zumbis, um grupo de cientistas e militares abrigados em um bunker subterrâneo na Flórida devem determinar como devem lidar com a horda de mortos-vivos e com as diferenças entre os sobreviventes.

programme.title: A Invasão Zumbi, (2013, Zombies)
programme.desc: Quando zumbis tomam conta de São Francisco, um grupo desesperado sobrevive trancando-se dentro da prisão de Alcatraz. Quando os mortos-vivos violam a ilha, nossos heróis são forçados a retornar ao continente invadido pelos mortos-vivos.

programme.title: Busca de Vingança, (2015, Thriller)
programme.desc: Baseado em um conto clássico de Edgar Allan Poe, este filme desafia a percepção da realidade. Busca de Vingança nos mostra como Edgar torna se uma força de terror contra qualquer um que está entre ele e seu desejo de vingança.

programme.title: Paciente Zero, (2020, Thriller)
programme.desc: Quando os testes médicos são levados ao limite, os experimentos mais extremos terminam na ilha de St. Leonards, no Atlântico Norte - uma prisão destinada a alguns dos criminosos mais violentos do mundo.

programme.title: Fera Da Neve, (2011, Creature Features)
programme.desc: Uma equipe de pesquisa na natureza selvagem se depara com um monstro aterrorizante.

programme.title: V/H/S - Viral, (2012, Zombies)
programme.desc: Em busca da fama na internet, um grupo de adolescentes começa a filmar fenômenos estranhos. Mas eles não sabem que só conseguirão a atenção desejada quando forem protagonistas de acontecimentos sobrenaturais e sangrentos.

programme.title: Apocalipse Zumbi, (2011, Zombies)
programme.desc: Meses depois que uma praga de zumbis exterminou 90% da população americana, um pequeno grupo de sobreviventes abre caminho pelo país em busca de um refúgio na ilha de Catalina.

programme.title: Dia dos Mortos 2 - O Contágio, (2005, Zombies)
programme.desc: Em 1968, os militares destroem uma instalação após a liberação de uma bactéria. Nos dias atuais, um paciente saindo de uma instituição psiquiátrica encontra um velho tubo de vácuo que, ao ser aberto, libera bactérias que transformam as pessoas em zumbis.

programme.title: Agome e Sango falam sobre seus respectivos passados, incluindo o irmão mais novo de Sango, Kohaku. Mas Narak tem planos sinistros para com ele.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR
programme.sub-title: A Angústia de Sango e a Vida de Kohaku

programme.title: Sango rouba a Tessaiga enquanto Inuyasha luta contra Kohaku e vai para o castelo de Narak. Ela pretende matá-lo, mas não será assim tão fácil.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR
programme.sub-title: A Tessaiga Roubada e o Confronto no Castelo de Narak

programme.title: Sango e Kirara precisam de um antídoto para o veneno de Narak, então Inuyasha e Agome vão para uma vila onde eles encontram o gentil youkai Jinenji.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR
programme.sub-title: Jinenji: O Youkai Bondoso e Solitário

programme.title: Inuyasha e seus amigos encontram uma caverna quando investigam youkais nas montanhas. Enquanto isso, Narak descobre que Kikyo ainda está viva.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR
programme.sub-title: Kikyo e Inuyasha Varridos pelo Miasma

programme.title: Inuyasha e seus amigos partem para salvar Kikyo, mas são vulneráveis a ataques de youkais. Apenas Agome está imune, graças à Jóia.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR

programme.title: Sesshomaru está insatisfeito com a espada Tenseiga, e ele exige que o ferreiro Totosai lhe faça outra. Totosai chama o Inuyasha.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR

programme.title: Inuyasha e Sesshomaru continuam sua batalha, fazendo pleno uso de suas respectivas heranças. Após a luta, Sesshomaru encontra a órfão Rin.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR
programme.sub-title: A Celebre Espada Escolhe seu Verdadeiro Mestre!

programme.title: Kuga, o líder da tribo de youkais lobos orientais, desafia Inuyasha para uma luta depois de usar os fragmentos da Jóia como acessórios.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR
programme.sub-title: O Sequestro de Agome! Kuga, O Youkai Lobo Super Veloz!

programme.title: Inuyasha e os outros estão a caminho para resgatar Agome e Shippo. Agome concorda em ajudar Kuga sob a condição de que Shippo não seja ferido.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR
programme.sub-title: O Youkai que se Apaixonou por Agome

programme.title: Agome retorna ao presente depois de outra discussão com Inuyasha. De volta à escola, ela se depara com mais problemas de relacionamento.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR
programme.sub-title: Separados, Os Dois se dão Conta de Seus Sentimentos

programme.title: Os insetos de Narak roubam um fragmento de Jóia da testa de um youkai urso. A cria de Narak, Kagura, usa um fragmento para controlar a tribo do lobo e Kuga.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR
programme.sub-title: Um Plano Ardiloso! Uma Luta de Vida ou Morte!

programme.title: A batalha de Inuyasha contra Kuga continua até que a própria Kagura apareça. A cria de Narak domina os ventos na batalha.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR
programme.sub-title: A Armadilha de Kagura: A Mestra do Vento!

programme.title: Mirok se reúne com Koharu, uma garota que fugiu de sua aldeia depois que eles se conheceram. Então a irmã mais velha de Kagura, Kanna, usa Koharu para atacar Inuyasha.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR
programme.sub-title: A Dança de Kagura e Espelho de Kanna

programme.title: Inuyasha continua lutando contra Kagura. O espelho de Kanna revela recursos inesperados quando Inuyasha usa a Ferida do Vento contra ela.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR

programme.title: Inuyasha exige saber por que Kikyo deu os fragmentos da Jóia que ela roubou de Agome para Narak, que libera um youkai com chifres.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR

programme.title: Sesshomaru leva as presas do falecido Goshinki ao renegado aprendiz de Totosai, Kaijinbo, para fazer uma nova espada, enquanto Totosai repara Tessaiga.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR

programme.title: A batalha de Kaijinbo com Inuyasha, empunhando a espada Tokijin, termina em destruição, e Kagura sente uma abertura para Sesshomaru destruir seu irmão.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR

programme.title: Kuga quer se vingar de Narak pela morte de seus membros da tribo. Quando o mais novo lacaio de Narak, Juromaru, o desafia, ele tem sua chance.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR

programme.title: Agome retorna ao presente depois de uma briga com Inuyasha. Enquanto isso, Narak planeja se livrar dos sentimentos de Onigumo por Kikyo dentro dele.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR
programme.sub-title: O Coração de Onigumo Ainda Vive em Narak

programme.title: No presente, Agome sente que Inuyasha escolheu Kikyo, e decide nunca mais voltar ao passado depois de devolver os fragmentos da Jóia.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR
programme.sub-title: Quero Voltar ao Lugar Onde Nós Conhecemos

programme.title: Sango encontra os corpos de seu pai e os outros exterminadores nas ruínas do castelo de Narak. Seu irmão Kohaku ainda vive, mas ele perdeu a memória.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR

programme.title: O irmão de Sango, Kohaku, foi possuído por Narak e está tentando matar Agome. Enquanto isso, Inuyasha e Mirok continuam lutando contra Kagura.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR
programme.sub-title: O Rosto que Não Sai do Meu Coração

programme.title: Sesshomaru visita o youkai da árvore Bokusen-Oh buscando os segredos da transformação de Inuyasha. Enquanto isso, Sango se preocupa com um Kohaku inconsciente.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR

programme.title: Inuyasha se transforma em um youkai quando sua vida corre perigo. Ele rapidamente acaba com Gatenmaru, que se transformou. Ele ataca os bandidos que estão escapando com suas garras, e ele não pode ouvir Agome tentando pará-lo.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR
programme.sub-title: A Verdadeira Natureza do Youkai Não Pode ser Reprimida

programme.title: Inuyasha visita Totosai com a Tessaiga quebrada. Sua própria presa é usada para consertá-la.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR
programme.sub-title: O Inimigo Mortal de Meu Pai: Ryukusei

programme.title: Ryukotsusei tira a Tessaiga de Inuyasha e ele se transforma em um youkai. Totosai diz a todos para recuar porque estão em perigo, mas Agome decide ficar para trás.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR
programme.sub-title: Onda Explosiva! O Ataque Supremo da Tessaiga

programme.title: Em uma certa aldeia, Shippo conhece uma garota chamada Satsuki. Satsuki acredita que seu irmão, que foi à guerra, voltará. Ela mostra a Shippo o tesouro que seu irmão lhe deu, um fragmento de Jóia. Infelizmente, é apenas uma flor feita de pedra.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR
programme.sub-title: A Flor de Pedra e o Primeiro Amor de Shippo

programme.title: Os maridos estão sendo atraídos para longe de sua aldeia por uma bela youkai. Suas esposas pedem a Mirok para derrotá-la. Preocupado com ele, Sango o acompanha. Mas Sango é separada dele por uma névoa estranha.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR
programme.sub-title: A Tentação da Linda Mulher na Névoa

programme.title: Sango volta para a vila dos exterminadores para consertar seu Osso Voador. Indo para o poço, Agome encontra uma Nimenka, uma fruta que parece um rosto.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR
programme.sub-title: Tudo o que Aconteceu na Noite de Togenkyo: Parte 1

programme.title: Tokajin sequestra Agome. Inuyasha escapa do jardim em miniatura com a ajuda de Mirok e os outros e vai salvar Agome. Enquanto escapa, ele encontra uma flor com o rosto de um velho sábio.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR
programme.sub-title: Tudo o que Aconteceu na Noite de Togenkyo: Parte 2

programme.title: Sango retorna para a sua vila e conserta o Osso Voador. Ela também coloca o pai e as cinzas de seus companheiros para descansar. Quando ela está prestes a sair, ela é atacada.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR

programme.title: Narak chama uma sacerdotisa chamada Tsubaki. Há cinquenta anos ela foi derrotada por Kikyo quando foi atrás da Jóia. Ela é uma sacerdotisa sombria que vendeu sua alma a um youkai para manter sua juventude e agora está atrás do sangue de Agome.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR
programme.sub-title: A Sacerdotisa das Sombras; Uma Maldição de 50 Anos

programme.title: Agome luta contra a maldição colocada por Tsubaki, uma sacerdotisa sombria. Enquanto isso, Kikyo aparece diante de Tsubaki.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR
programme.sub-title: Kikyou Aparece! O Uso do Shikigami

programme.title: Jotaro e seu grupo vão ao Egito em um submarino para enfrentar DIO, mas uma caneca de café passa por uma estranha transformação quando eles se aproximam do continente.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.title: Quando precisam sair do submarino e escapar do Stand inimigo, Jotaro e seu grupo encontram o que parecem ser dois túneis embaixo d'água.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.title: Um helicóptero aterrissa na frente de Jotaro e seu grupo no Egito, mas não parece trazer a ajuda que Joseph pediu.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure
programme.sub-title: Iggy, o louco, e N'Doul, o deus Geb – Parte 1

programme.title: Avdol cria um plano para se defender do Stand, mas o inimigo está atento. Iggy, que deveria ajudar o grupo, cai no sono bem no meio da luta.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure
programme.sub-title: Iggy, o louco, e N'Doul, o deus Geb – Parte 2

programme.title: Kakyoin e Avdol procuram tratamento médico enquanto os outros homens entram em um café e são recebidos por dois irmãos usuários de Stand.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure
programme.sub-title: O Khnum do Ongo e o Thoth do Bongo

programme.title: Um jovem chamado Chaka tem uma mudança súbita de personalidade depois de encontrar uma espada misteriosa. Jotaro e seu grupo viajam para o Cairo.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.title: Polnareff percebe que a espada de Chaka é um Stand quando é atacado por seu barbeiro. O problema é que a espada está mais poderosa desde a última luta.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.title: Jotaro e seus aliados chegam à cidade de Luxor, e Joseph leva um choque ao tocar uma estranha pedra com uma tomada elétrica.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.title: Joseph e Avdol ficam presos um ao outro por causa do Stand inimigo. Quando eles finalmente conseguem se separar, acabam prendendo os pés em um trilho de trem.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.title: Polnareff nota que seus sapatos aumentaram de tamanho subitamente após tentar perseguir um homem que o seguia.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.title: Polnareff, numa versão criança, precisa enfrentar o usuário de Stand Alessi contando apenas com seu minúsculo Stand. Na hora H, ele recorre a uma solução impensável.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.title: Jotaro e seu grupo finalmente chegam ao Cairo. Eles encontram um homem que diz saber onde fica a mansão de DIO, mas ele se recusa a dar esta informação de graça.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.title: Jotaro demonstra suas habilidades com o Stand antes de começar uma partida de pôquer com D’Arby como aviso para que ninguém trapaceie.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.title: Hol Horse chega ao aeroporto do Cairo com ordens para matar Jotaro e seus aliados. Dentro da mala, ele traz um novo e relutante parceiro.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.title: Hol Horse age de acordo com a profecia do livro, mas começa a questionar tudo quando Jotaro e o resto do grupo aparecem.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.title: Avdol procura informações sobre a mansão de DIO no Cairo. Iggy enfrenta dois cães ameaçadores durante um passeio pela cidade.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure
programme.sub-title: O guardião do inferno Pet Shop – Parte 1

programme.title: Iggy foge para o rio após se ferir gravemente na luta contra Petto Shoppu, mas não dá sinais de que vai desistir.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure
programme.sub-title: O guardião do inferno Pet Shop – Parte 2

programme.title: Jotaro e seu grupo são recebidos na porta da mansão de DIO por um mordomo chamado D’Arby, que alega ser irmão mais novo de D’Arby, o apostador.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.title: Kakyoin perde a alma em um jogo de corrida contra D’Arby. Joseph escolhe um jogo que é a especialidade do mordomo e leva uma bronca de Jotaro.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.title: Mesmo estranhando as atitudes de Jotaro, D'Arby se mantém confiante graças ao Stand. Avdol e os outros entram na mansão.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure
programme.sub-title: O miasma do vazio, Cool Ice – Parte 1

programme.title: Polnareff e Iggy vão com tudo para destruir DIO, mas o terrível vampiro Cool Ice ataca os dois de surpresa.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure
programme.sub-title: O miasma do vazio, Cool Ice – Parte 2

programme.title: Gravemente ferido, Iggy usa suas últimas forças para salvar Polnareff, que aproveita para ferir Cool Ice na cabeça.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure
programme.sub-title: O miasma do vazio, Cool Ice – Parte 3

programme.title: Polnareff finalmente enfrenta DIO, mas não consegue se aproximar. De longe, ele libera sua arma secreta para revelar o Stand de seu terrível oponente.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.title: Kakyoin quer revelar a identidade do Stand de DIO, e para isso usa seu próprio Stand em um ataque concentrado.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.title: DIO usa seu Stand e consegue parar o tempo, mas quando vai atacar, percebe que os dedos de Jotaro estão se mexendo. Quem vencerá esta batalha?
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.title: DIO contempla sua vitória. Enfurecido, Jotaro enfrenta seu inimigo em uma batalha final. O cenário? Um mundo em que o tempo está congelado.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure
programme.sub-title: O adeus da longa jornada, amigos

programme.title: Jotaro Kujo vai para a cidade de Morioh à procura de Josuke Higashikata. Ele vê alguém que acaba sendo Josuke se desculpando com uns valentões.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.title: O Stand de Angelo consegue entrar no corpo das pessoas. Apesar de Jotaro avisar para não consumirem nada, Josuke surpreende a mãe tomando um gole de café.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.title: Para proteger a cidade, Jotaro quer destruir o misterioso arco e flecha que despertou o poder do Stand de Angelo.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.title: Para tentar salvar Koichi, Josuke vai à casa de Okuyasu Nijimura, mas é atacado por seu irmão, Keicho. Josuke propõe um acordo a Okuyasu, que está ferido.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.title: Josuke e Koichi decidem encontrar o arco e flecha e destruí-lo para impedir que haja mais vítimas. Eles o encontram no sótão, mas escutam um som estranho.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.title: A caminho da escola de bicicleta, Koichi atropela um gato dentro de um saco. Um homem vê o acidente e chantageia Koichi, exigindo que ele pague pelo enterro do animal.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.title: Josuke e Koichi tentam descobrir se o colega de escola Toshikazu Hazamada está mesmo usando um Stand e encontram um boneco de madeira no armário dele.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.title: A colega de escola Yukako Yamagishi confessa seu amor por Koichi. Ele fica muito feliz, mas ela acaba indo longe demais.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.title: Um Garoto no Palácio de Aladim, (1998, Action)
programme.desc: Calvin, um jovem entregador de pizza, é confundido com o "Grande Libertador" por um gênio, que o atrai de volta ao século VIII, onde deve unir forças com Ali Babá para salvar toda a Arábia do irmão maligno de Aladim, Luxor.

programme.title: Thor - O Herói de Guerra, (2008, Action)
programme.desc: Em 1945, durante a Segunda Guerra, o jovem Tom mora no interior com seus tios, após ver seus pais morrerem em um ataque nazista. Amargurado, o rapaz faz amizade com um cão pastor e juntos eles vivem grandes aventuras.

programme.title: Em Busca do Portal Mágico, (2019, Action)
programme.desc: A quieta e divertida Monika se muda para uma nova casa e faz amizade com David. Juntos, eles encontram um relógio mágico capaz de fazê-los viajar no tempo. Mas seria essa a solução para os problemas de todos?

programme.title: Guardiões do Tempo, (2020, Fantasy)
programme.desc: Uma menina tenta salvar seus pais adotivos, opondo-se às forças do mal no outro mundo de São Petersburgo.

programme.title: Fora do Rumo, (2016, Action)
programme.desc: Um detetive de Hong Kong se une a um jogador americano para lutar contra um notório criminoso chinês.

programme.title: Um Garoto no Palácio de Aladim, (1998, Action)
programme.desc: Calvin, um jovem entregador de pizza, é confundido com o "Grande Libertador" por um gênio, que o atrai de volta ao século VIII, onde deve unir forças com Ali Babá para salvar toda a Arábia do irmão maligno de Aladim, Luxor.

programme.title: Thor - O Herói de Guerra, (2008, Action)
programme.desc: Em 1945, durante a Segunda Guerra, o jovem Tom mora no interior com seus tios, após ver seus pais morrerem em um ataque nazista. Amargurado, o rapaz faz amizade com um cão pastor e juntos eles vivem grandes aventuras.

programme.title: Em Busca do Portal Mágico, (2019, Action)
programme.desc: A quieta e divertida Monika se muda para uma nova casa e faz amizade com David. Juntos, eles encontram um relógio mágico capaz de fazê-los viajar no tempo. Mas seria essa a solução para os problemas de todos?

programme.title: Guardiões do Tempo, (2020, Fantasy)
programme.desc: Uma menina tenta salvar seus pais adotivos, opondo-se às forças do mal no outro mundo de São Petersburgo.

programme.title: O Fantasma, (1996, Action)
programme.desc: A história começa como uma expedição à ilha de Bengalla, buscando as Caveiras de Touganda. Devido à sua enorme energia, elas podem ser desastrosas para a raça humana. Agora, o mal encontrou rival à altura e a aventura ganhou um nome: Fantasma!

programme.title: O Justiceiro, (1995, Action)
programme.desc: Um policial problemático disfarçado deve se infiltrar em uma gangue implacável. Mas as coisas azedam quando outro policial revela seu disfarce e ele rapidamente se vê lutando por sua vida e pela vida de sua família.

programme.title: O Vingador Marcial, (2024, Action)
programme.desc: Depois de matar um adversário em uma luta clandestina, um campeão de artes marciais e MMA vê sua vida virar de cabeça para baixo quando uma gangue rival, em busca de vingança, mata sua esposa durante um ataque de vingança.

programme.title: Cão de briga, (2005, Action)
programme.desc: Criado por um mafioso (Hoskins) como um animal para ser uma máquina de matar, (Jet Li) é campeão de lutas clandestinas que ajuda pianista cego (Freeman) perseguido por criminosos.

programme.title: O Duelo Final, (2020, Action)
programme.desc: Uma ex-lutadora relutantemente retorna à vida que ela abandonou para ajudar sua irmã a sobreviver ao mundo sádico das lutas ilegais e do maníaco que o comanda.

programme.title: O Monge à Prova de Balas, (2020, Action)
programme.desc: Baseado em uma história em quadrinhos "underground", ele conta a história de um monge tibetano imortal -Chow- que se torna o mentor de um jovem menino de rua -Scott-, a quem ele ensina a proteger um velho pergaminho que o monge cuidou durante anos.

programme.title: O Dragão Invencível, (2019, Action)
programme.desc: Um agente da polícia à paisana procura vingança contra um sindicato do crime implacável após o assassinato do seu parceiro.

programme.title: Ip Man - O Mestre do Kung Fu, (2020, Action)
programme.desc: Durante o tempo em que foi capitão da polícia na cidade de Foshan, Ip Man é perseguido por um gângster vingativo, enquanto o exército japonês invade a região.

programme.title: Juiz Arqueiro, (2016, Action)
programme.desc: Um homem, que é encarregado de resolver algumas discuptas entre academinas rivais de artes marciais fica dividido. Ele não sabe se escolhe cumprir o dever do que lhe foi delegado ou se vinga a horna de sua família.

programme.title: Kickboxer: A Retaliação, (2018, Action)
programme.desc: Kurt Sloan prometeu a si mesmo que não voltaria para a Tailândia, mas alguém o seda e o força a retornar ao país asiático.

programme.title: Era uma vez na China 3, (1992, Action)
programme.desc: Mestre Wong e seus discípulos entram na 'Competição de Leão Dançante' para deter um plano de assassinato e enfrentar um oponente arrogante.

programme.title: Fun in Acapulco, (1963, Musical)
programme.desc: Elvis heads south of the border, where he’s fired as a boat hand, hired as a lifeguard and singer, admired by local beauties and inspired to jump off a 136-foot cliff. Put another way: he overcomes a fear of heights in spectacular fashion.

programme.title: A Night To Remember, (1958, Drama)
programme.desc: On her maiden voyage in April 1912, the supposedly unsinkable RMS Titanic strikes an iceberg in the Atlantic Ocean.

programme.title: Lilies Of The Field, (1963, Drama)
programme.desc: Nominated for 5 Academy Awards® including Best Picture and winner of the Best Actor Oscar® for Sidney Poitier for his role as an itinerant handyman who stops to help five impoverished nuns and the small Arizona desert town in which they reside.

programme.title: The Defiant Ones, (1958, Thriller)
programme.desc: In Stanley Kramer's cinema classic, screen legends Sidney Poitier and Tony Curtis star as two convicts on the run from a Southern work gang who are bound together by an unbreakable iron chain and separated by an unbridled hatred for each other.

programme.title: In the Heat of the Night, (1967, Drama)
programme.desc: Sidney Poitier and Rod Steiger (who won a Best Actor Oscar® for his performance) shine in this classic mystery-thriller that took home five Academy Awards®, including Best Picture and Best Adapted Screenplay. Lee Grant and Warren Oates also star.

programme.title: Two For The Seesaw, (1962, Drama)
programme.desc: Robert Wise directs Robert Mitchum and Shirley MacLaine in this spicy and poignant love story about a free-spirited Greenwich Village girl who hooks up with a brooding Nebraska lawyer.

programme.title: The Night of the Hunter, (1955, Drama)
programme.desc: Robert Mitchum stars in an unforgettable role as a psychopathic preacher in the relentless pursuit of two children who have their dead father's stolen fortune hidden in a doll. Shelley Winters co-stars.

programme.title: Flying Tigers, (1942, War)
programme.desc: John Wayne adds luster to this early WWII film about the famous P-40 Flying Group who soared into battle against the Japanese in defense of China's freedom, Great dogfight scenes!

programme.title: Sands of Iwo Jima, (1950, War)
programme.desc: Tough-as-nails career Marine Sergeant John Stryker is greatly disliked by the men of his squad, particularly the combat replacements, for the rigorous training he puts them through.

programme.title: Paycheck, (2003, Action)
programme.desc: Michael Jennings works on top-secret projects. After each job, his memory is erased. After his latest assignment, he is shocked to be told that he agreed to forfeit all payment, until he receives an envelope containing clues to his forgotten past.

programme.title: The Boondock Saints, (1999, Thriller)
programme.desc: Two Irish Catholic brothers become vigilantes and wipe out Boston's criminal underworld in the name of God.

programme.title: Universal Soldier, (1992, Action)
programme.desc: A woman reporter discovers a Defense Department project to create androids from the bodies of Vietnam soldiers, to be then used as an elite anti-terrorism unit.

programme.title: Hunter x Hunter

programme.desc: A couple's marriage is threatened when the baby surrogate they've hired becomes obsessed and wants the husband and baby inside of her for her own.

programme.desc: When a little girl is kidnapped by a trafficking ring, they soon find they messed with the wrong child. Her mother, a notorious former gang leader, is close on their trail and will go to any lengths to bring her daughter home.

programme.title: Once Upon a Time in Shanghai, (2014, Action)
programme.desc: Ma dreams of making a life in Shanghai without using his fist. But when he befriends the Boss of a rival gang, he must fight for honor or lose everything.

programme.title: The Raid: Redemption, (2012, Action)
programme.desc: Deep in the heart of Jakarta's slums lies a drug-gang’s safe house, home to some of the most terrifying and ruthless fighters in the city. Arriving before dawn, an elite swat team moves in to take down the notorious drug lord that runs it.

programme.title: The Raid 2 (Subtitled), (2014, Action)
programme.desc: Following immediately after the events of THE RAID, Rama (Iko Uwais) is forced to reinvent himself as an undercover cop in order to provide protection for his wife and child.

programme.title: CAROLINA, (2003, Romantic comedy)
programme.desc: Julia Stiles and Oscar winner Shirley MacLaine headline this charming romantic comedy in which a young woman tries to escape the eccentric ways of her wacky Southern family and meet the man of her dreams.

programme.desc: A troubled young woman is sent to live with her grandmother for the summer, while hiding a secret that could potentially tear her family apart.

programme.desc: She’s a high school girl from the wrong side of town. He’s the wealthy heartthrob who asks her to the prom. But as fast as their romance builds, it’s threatened by the painful reality of peer pressure.

programme.desc: Barbra Streisand stars in this beautifully portrayed story of a young independent woman who is forced to masquerade as a boy in order to pursue her love of knowledge.

programme.title: Grease 2, (1982, Musical)

programme.desc: The life of Bob Dylan is examined through multiple variations of his own personality and career, as played by a series of different actors.

programme.title: The Mexican, (2001, Action)

programme.title: The Pianist, (2002, Drama)
programme.desc: BEST PICTURE WINNER & 7-TIME OSCAR NOMINEE, THE PIANIST is director Roman Polanski’s most personal movie ever, and stars Oscar winner Adrien Brody in the true-life story of brilliant pianist, Wladyslaw Szpilman.

programme.title: The Pursuit of Happyness, (2006, Drama)
programme.desc: Inspired by the true story about a single father and his young son. Finding themselves homeless, he risks everything on an unpaid internship in a highly competitive stockbroker training program, where only one in twenty interns make the grade.

programme.desc: Caesar’s a guy who launders money for the mob. What’s the last thing that would come between a sleazy wise guy like Caesar and that money? A couple of women with brains to die for and bodies to match.

programme.desc: Frank Vega (Danny Trejo)) and Bernie Pope (Danny Glover) return, this time to Louisiana in an attempt to find a kidnapped friend.

programme.title: The Woods, (2006, Drama)
programme.desc: A teenager is dropped off at a remote all-girls school deep in the forest. As her classmates start to disappear, the teenager begins to suspect that things are not what they appear to be at the school and that there is something in the forest.

programme.title: Bats, (1999, Creature Features)
programme.desc: Genetically mutated bats escape, and it's up to a bat expert and the local sheriff to stop them.

programme.title: The Crow, (1994, Action)
programme.desc: Visually stunning and action-packed, this hit movie, based on the comic book series, follows the return from the grave of a young rock guitarist who, along with his fiancée, is brutally killed by a ruthless gang of criminals.

programme.title: Bound, (1995, Thriller)
programme.desc: Caesar’s a guy who launders money for the mob. What’s the last thing that would come between a sleazy wise guy like Caesar and that money? A couple of women with brains to die for and bodies to match.

programme.title: Killing Them Softly, (2012, Drama)
programme.desc: During the economic turmoil of 2008, Jackie Cogan (Brad Pitt), an enforcer, is hired to restore order after three idiots rob a mob-protected poker game.

programme.title: King of New York, (1990, Thriller)
programme.desc: Recently freed from prison, Frank White (Christopher Walken) begins to exterminate the drug lords who rose to power in his absence. When a group of enraged cops declares war on him, Frank's answer is to put a contract out on the cops.

programme.title: Deuces Wild, (2002, Action)

programme.title: A Simple Plan, (1998, Drama)
programme.desc: In a gym bag. That's how three men size up what they've found in the snowy Minnesota woods. They've come across a downed plane with a rotting corpse inside...and over $4 million stuffed inside a duffel bag. Finders, keepers? Maybe.

programme.title: Righteous Kill, (2008, Action)
programme.desc: Two veteran New York City detectives (Academy-Award-winners Robert De Niro and Al Pacino) hunt a vigilante who may be one of their own.

programme.title: Thief, (1981, Drama)
programme.desc: Michael Mann directs this stylishly photographed action-packed drama that stars James Caan as a master safe cracker who is planning his last heist for the sake of a woman (Tuesday Weld).

programme.title: Layer Cake, (2004, Thriller)
programme.desc: Planning to retire and begin a new life, Mr. X (Daniel Craig, Lara Croft: Tomb Raider), a successful West End drug dealer, has been asked for one last favor: to negotiate the sale of one million hits of Ecstasy. Rated: R

programme.title: Donnie Brasco, (1997, Drama)
programme.desc: Posing as jewel broker Donnie Brasco, FBI agent Joseph D. Pistone (Johnny Depp) is granted entrance into the violent mob family of aging hit man Lefty Ruggiero (Al Pacino).

programme.title: American Hustle, (2013, Drama)
programme.desc: The con is on when scam artists and lovers Irving Rosenfeld and Sydney Prosser are entrapped by ambitious FBI agent Richie DiMaso and coerced into participating in a sting operation that hinges on snaring politician Carmine Polito and his associates.

programme.title: The Motel, (2005, Romantic comedy)
programme.desc: Puberty sucks, and nobody knows it better than 13-year-old Ernest. As he watches guests come and go, Ernest finds himself forever stuck at his family's hourly-rate motel and longing for the girl of his dreams, 15-year-old Christine.

programme.title: Short Term 12, (2013, Drama)
programme.desc: Short Term 12 follows Grace (Brie Larson), a twenty-something staff member at a foster care facility as she reckons with caring for the teens in her charge and her own past. This lovingly realized film finds truth and humor in unexpected places.

programme.title: The Commitments, (1991, Music)
programme.desc: Jimmy Rabbitte, an unemployed Dublin boy, decides to put together a soul band made up entirely of the Irish working class.

programme.title: Eagle Vs Shark, (2007, Romantic comedy)
programme.desc: Lily is reserved and awkward, while Jarrod is an introspective oddball who's blind to Lily's affection for him -- until a celebration mixed with a strange plan to exact revenge on Jarrod's high school foe brings the two misfits together.

programme.title: Son of Rambow, (2008, Comedy)
programme.desc: A hilariously fresh take on friendship, family, film heroes and the death-defying adventures of growing up in the video age.

programme.title: The Kill Room, (2023, Comedy)
programme.desc: A hitman, his boss, an art dealer and a money-laundering scheme that accidentally turns the assassin into an overnight avant-garde sensation, one that forces her to play the art world against the underworld.

programme.title: Drugstore June, (2024, Dark Humor & Black Comedies)
programme.desc: After the pharmacy in her small town is robbed, a girl who still lives at home with her parents takes matters into her own hands to solve the crime, while at the same time trying to get over her ex-boyfriend and become more of an adult.

programme.title: The Station Agent, (2003, Drama)
programme.desc: A loner with a passion for trains inherits an empty train station in the middle of nowhere. He encounters unexpected neighbors and with absolutely nothing in common, they form a friendship none of them could foresee.

programme.title: Cyrano, (2022, Drama)

programme.title: The Faculty, (1998, Horror)
programme.desc: A group of small-town high school students discovers their teachers are under the control of mind-controlling alien parasites. From a smart script by Kevin Williamson (SCREAM), and directed by action-expert Robert Rodriguez (FROM DUSK TO DAWN).

programme.desc: The devil will find work for idle hands to do, but what happens when he chooses the laziest teen slacker in the world to do his dirty work? Anton Tobias is a couch potato burn-out who can't control the murderous impulses of his possessed hand. Rated: R

programme.desc: Yugi's running out of life points, but can his cute little Deck Master Kuriboh unleash his furry fury to turn the tide of battle?

programme.desc: As Téa's body turns more and more into a giant popsicle, can she keep her brain from freezing to find a way to melt Big 2's strategy? Or will Big 2's penguin horde waddle all over her?

programme.desc: Joey squares off against the judicial jerk Big 3 Johnson who takes the Deck Master form of Judge Man! How can Joey defeat a foe who can destroy Joey's monsters at will?

programme.desc: Big 4 Nezbitt challenges Duke, Tristan, and Serenity for the right to gain control of three bodies at once! Will Serenity's errors cost her team the ultimate price when Tristan and Duke can't cover for her mistakes?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: One down, two to go! With the loss of Tristan, Serenity is heartbroken. Can she pull herself together and remember the lessons Tristan taught her to turn the duel around?

programme.desc: Tristan's back... but he's not who he appears to be when he kidnaps Mokuba! It's time for Kaiba to stop monkeying around and rescue his brother, but he's confronted by Big 5 Leichter!

programme.desc: Big 5's Satellite Cannon attacks Kaiba's monsters from deep space! Mokuba's unwavering faith in Kaiba inspires him to believe that his brother will pull out the victory, but Noah has plans to ruin their brotherhood...

programme.desc: Kaiba arrives at Noah's sanctuary to rescue Mokuba, but Mokuba wants to stay with Noah! Has Mokuba seen the evil within Kaiba, or is something more sinister in the works?

programme.sub-title: Merger of the Big Five, Part 3

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: It's a duel for control of KaibaCorp when Noah squares off against Kaiba! But can Kaiba fight at full strength after he learns the hidden truth about Noah... and the tragic past that made him what he is today?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Noah's Shinato's Ark steals monsters into its keep to use as an impenetrable wall of servants! How can Kaiba hurt Noah when Noah has an endless stream of monsters to protect himself with?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Kaiba's about to finish Noah, but Mokuba protects Noah from his final blow! Will Kaiba sacrifice his beloved brother in exchange for freedom, or will the brotherly bond remain unbreakable?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: For every turn that passes, one of Yugi's friends is transformed into stone! As more and more of his friends harden into solid rock, can Yugi defeat Noah before he runs out of turns and transforms into stone himself?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi's friends are petrified into solid stone statues, but their spirits live on! Their combined souls energize Yugi into a noble fight, but is spirit going to win the duel when Yugi's not drawing the right cards?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi has defeated Noah... but they still can't escape from the virtual world! The real reason behind their entrapment is revealed... as is the true villain pulling the strings!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: As Kaiba squares off against his stepfather Gozaburo for their final battle, Yugi and friends are attacked by endless hordes of monsters! Their only hope is Noah, but they can't expect help from their enemy... can they?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Time is almost up before the missile's explosion destroys Yugi and friends! Will the Battle City finalists beat the clock and live to duel another day in the stunning conclusion to the virtual world saga!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi and friends arrive at KaibaCorp Island where the Battle City finalists will compete in the ultimate dueling arena! Get ready for the awesome four-person battle royal where any duelist can attack anyone else!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Honor, friendship, revenge... As each duelist remembers what they're fighting for, the battle royal rages on where none of the duelists know where the next attack is going to come from!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Joey may have fought some of the fiercest fights in Battle City, but has all his training taught him to become an elite duelist? Joey's gonna show what he's made of in the conclusion to the four-man battle royal!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Marik ensnares Joey in a Shadow Game where each duelist's heart is linked with his monsters... literally! Every time a monster received damage, the duelist feels the pain instead!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Marik's Helpoemer send Joey's powerful cards to the graveyard before Joey can use them! Running low on cards and life points, Joey's opportunities for staging a comeback are nearly depleted!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Joey thinks this duel can't turn any worse... but Marik has all the pieces necessary to summon The Winged Dragon of Ra! Can Joey prevent Marik from summoning the Egyptian God Card, or is victory simply not in the cards?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Marik transforms The Winged Dragon of Ra into its powerful form, the Egyptian God Phoenix! If Joey can't withstand the Phoenix's blazing fire, he'll lose the duel... plus his only chance to save Mai from her mental prison!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: It's the rematch we've all been waiting for! Yugi and Kaiba square off for the first time since Duelist Kingdom in front of thousands of ravenous fans for the right to challenge Marik! It's time to duel!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Kaiba has all the monsters necessary to summon Obelisk the Tormentor to finish Yugi off! Though overwhelmed and outmatched, nothing is going to stop Yugi from trying to summon his Egyptian God first!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: When Yugi's Slifer the Sky Dragon clashes against Kaiba's Obelisk the Tormentor, what will happen when two Egyptian Gods fight each other? It's time to find out which Egyptian God is truly stronger!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: The clash of the two Egyptian God Monsters releases mystical energies that show Yugi and Kaiba visions of the ancient Egyptian past! What new answers do these images unlock, and what prophecies do they make for the future?

programme.title: Zoro is held against his will by the pink-haired princess of bad vibes, Brook gets mistaken for the king of darkness, and Luffy continues to eat his way toward a reunion with Fire-Fist Ace!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: THE FRIENDS' WHEREABOUTS! A NEGATIVE PRINCESS AND THE KING OF DEMONS!

programme.title: Luffy and Boa arrive at Impel Down, but only thirty-three hours remain until Ace's execution. To save him, the Snake Princess must find a way to hide Luffy during her full-body search!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: A DEADLY INFILTRATION! THE UNDERWATER PRISON IMPEL DOWN

programme.title: Time is running out on Ace, so Luffy teams up with a scoundrel who's going to pieces trying to escape Impel Down. There's no love lost between the former foes, but they'd better work together if they want to survive.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: A REUNION IN HELL?! THE MAN WHO ATE THE CHOP-CHOP FRUIT!

programme.title: Luffy must part ways with a priceless treasure map before Buggy the Clown agrees to lead him through the bloody tangle of Blade Trees and Spike Needle Grass that make up Impel Down's Crimson Hell!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: BREAK THROUGH THE CRIMSON HELL! BUGGY'S CHAOS-INDUCING PLAN

programme.title: Luffy and Buggy the Clown could end up as hippo food if they aren't careful in Impel Down's Wild Beast Hell. Of course, the rubber-man might find that a better fate than dealing with the prison's putrid warden!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: THE STRONGEST MAN IN THE PRISON! POISON MAN MAGELLAN APPEARS

programme.title: Luffy and his crew stumble upon a most peculiar village when they hitch a ride on a fire-breathing beetle. The natives are petrified of pirates, but they welcome the Straw Hats with open arms!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: A SPECIAL PRESENTATION RELATED TO THE MOVIE / A GOLD LION'S AMBITION ON THE MOVE

programme.title: The citizens of Little East Blue throw in a feast in honor of the Straw Hats, but when the Amigo Pirates try to capture Boss the Beetle, Luffy and his crew will have to defend their new friends.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: A SPECIAL PRESENTATION RELATED TO THE MOVIE / LITTLE EAST BLUE IN DANGER

programme.title: Luffy, Zoro, and Sanji prepare to do battle on behalf of Boss the Beetle, but Captain Largo of the Amigo Pirates counters with a deadly arsenal of nets to put the Straw Hat brawlers on lock down!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: A SPECIAL PRESENTATION RELATED TO THE MOVIE / THE FIERCE ONSLAUGHT OF THE AMIGO PIRATES

programme.title: Luffy kicks into Second Gear for his rematch with Largo, and Nami leads the islanders as they lay waste to the Amigo Pirates. Boss the Beetle may be safe for now, but someone sinister lurks behind the scenes.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: A Special Presentation Related to the Movie/ The Battle is on! Luffy Vs. Largo

programme.title: Luffy struggles to stay a step ahead of a prison patrol made up of hungry lions and poisonous scorpions! Meanwhile, Ace spends what could be his final hours swapping stories with a pirate who hates pirates.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: A Warlord in Prison Jimbei, The Honorable Pirate

programme.title: While the guards struggle to squelch a violent prison uprising, Luffy and his fellow fugitives try to keep their cool in a level of Impel Down known as Starvation Hell!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The Trap of Chief Guard Saldeath - Level 3 Starvation Hell

programme.title: Boa Hancock uses her ample assets to buy some private time for a clandestine chat with Ace. Meanwhile, Luffy needs help from a graceful friend to escape the jaws of a hungry Sphinx!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The Liberated Swan! Reunion! Bon Kurei

programme.title: Luffy and Bon are on the verge of reaching Level 4, but they didn't count on fighting a demonic, lightning-fast, devastatingly powerful Minotaur! To defeat this beast, they'll need help from a human candle and a deranged clown!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Chief Warden Magellan Moves - The Net to Trap Straw Hat Is Complete!

programme.title: Luffy narrowly avoids a deadly dip in the boiling pool of blood, only to find himself face to face with Warden Magellan. Meanwhile, outside the prison walls, the marine fleet prepares for Whitebeard's onslaught!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Preparations for War! A Decisive Battle in Level 4 - Blazing Hell

programme.title: Warden Magellan is a monster of a man with a penchant for poisoning prisoners. To rescue Ace, Luffy must go toe to toe with this toxic terror, but how do you defeat a foe who's deadly to the touch?
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Magellan's Strength! Bon Kurei Flees Before His Enemy

programme.title: Luffy's daring assault on the venomous warden of Impel Down leaves him struggling to stand up, but despite the lethal poison breaking down his body, the rubber-man kicks his rescue mission into Second Gear!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: THE SHOWDOWN HAS COME! LUFFY'S DESPERATE LAST ATTACK!

programme.title: While Luffy hovers perilously on the verge of death, Bon Clay embarks on a suicidal rescue mission plagued by sub-zero temperatures and bloodthirsty wolves with a supremely savage disposition!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: FOR HIS FRIEND! BON CLAY'S DEADLY RESCUE ATTEMPT

programme.title: No existing antidote can save Luffy from the poison coursing through his veins, yet Bon Clay refuses to give up. His final, fleeting hope is a mysterious miracle-worker rumored to have vanished into the Gates of Hell!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: A PARADISE IN HELL / IMPEL DOWN LEVEL 5.5

programme.title: Bon is overjoyed to hear that Luffy is still alive, but his happiness quickly turns to shock when he learns that Ivan's agonizingly painful "Healing Hormones" will cost the rubber-man ten years of his life!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: LUFFY'S TREATMENT BEGINS / IVA'S MIRACULOUS POWER!

programme.title: Ace is scheduled to be executed in a matter of hours, and Luffy's still hovering on the verge of death. It will take a miracle to save them both, but Bon would rather die than give up on his friend!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: BELIEVE IN MIRACLES! BON CLAY'S CRIES FROM THE HEART

programme.title: Luffy miraculously survived his brush with death, but he's far too weak to finish rescuing Ace. Ivan is reluctant to lend a hormonal hand to the doomed rescue mission – until he learns of Luffy's lineage!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: LUFFY BACK IN ACTION! IVA BEGINS THE BREAKOUT PLAN!!

programme.title: The quest to rescue Ace tuckers out thanks to a blast of sleeping gas! Ivan's scissor-handed sidekick puts an end to nap time, but Luffy will have to join forces with a scar-faced foe from the past if he wants to complete his mission!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: ACE'S CONVOY BEGINS / BATTLE ON THE LOWEST FLOOR, LEVEL 6!

programme.title: Luffy's desperate attempt to rescue Ace is bolstered by two powerful new allies: the murderous Crocodile and the honorable fishman Jinbei. Meanwhile, Ivan sparks a prison riot to create a diversion for the rubber-man.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: THE ULTIMATE TEAM IS FORMED / SHAKING IMPEL DOWN!

programme.title: Luffy and his gang of outlaws cause a commotion on Level Four, Blackbeard's arrival leads to the release of the prison's most feared inmate, and Ace gazes upon the great blue sky for what could be the very last time!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: EVEN MORE CHAOS! BLACKBEARD TEACH INVADES

programme.title: Ivan undergoes a curvaceous transformation to better battle sadistic Sadie, the commander of the Demon Guards. Meanwhile, Blackbeard and Shiryu head for a showdown on Level 1!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: THE DANGEROUS ENCOUNTER! BLACKBEARD AND SHIRYU OF THE RAIN!

programme.title: Luffy's bone-crushing battle with the Vice Warden of Impel Down is interrupted by the sudden appearance of Blackbeard. When the rubber-man hears what the warlord has to say – heads will roll!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: REFUSAL TO BE DEFEATED! SERIOUS HANNYABAL

programme.title: Even in Second Gear, Luffy is no match for Blackbeard's vortex, but the rubber-man rebounds by knocking out a Demon Guard with one ferocious pistol-punch. Elsewhere, Warden Magellan vows to finish Luffy once and for all!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: JET PISTOL OF ANGER! LUFFY VS. BLACKBEARD!

programme.title: Ace is to be executed in a matter of hours, and Magellan's toxic breath is singeing the back of Luffy's neck. Ivan uses a devastating Death Wink to buy some time, but the warden's Poison Hydra may be more than he can handle!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: STOP MAGELLAN! IVA'S ESOTERIC TECHNIQUE EXPLODES!

programme.title: Luffy dons a suit of waxy armor in preparation for his rematch with Warden Magellan. Outside the prison walls, Jimbei turns a door into a boat, so Crocodile and Buggy can commandeer an escape vessel!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: MAGELLAN'S TRICKY MOVE! A FOILED ESCAPE PLAN!

programme.title: Magellan takes his toxic attack to the next level by unleashing the hideous and deadly Venom Demon! If Jimbei and Crocodile don't return with a rescue ship soon, Luffy won't survive long enough to save Ace!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: THE ESCAPEE TEAM IN TROUBLE! THE FORBIDDEN MOVE: VENOM DEMON!

programme.title: Luffy and his merry band of escapees are safely onboard the rescue ship, but they're not out of hot water just yet. A fleet of marines is bombarding them with cannon balls, and an impenetrable gate looms on the horizon!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: COME, FINAL MIRACLE! BREAK THROUGH THE GATE OF JUSTICE!

programme.title: Luffy and Ivan mourn the loss of Bon Clay, and Captain Buggy's reputation gets a boost when a phone call from the Marines reveals the secrets of his past.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: TO THE NAVY HEADQUARTERS! OFF TO RESCUE ACE!

programme.title: While Luffy continues his rescue mission, Nami learns a lesson about how to turn rain into cash, and Franky wakes up in a freezing forest full of ferocious cyborg animals!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: THE FRIENDS' WHEREABOUTS! THE WEATHERIA REPORT AND THE CYBORG ANIMALS!

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: The World Crime Prevention Devices Association has developed the "killer safe" that sent many safe crackers to their graves. But Lupin takes the challenge to steal what it guards.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Lupin crashes crime boss Markane's masquerade party, but the party was just a ruse to entrap Lupin. Lupin gets hung by rope in the dark and is made the target of Markane's murder game in ten rounds, of which players have to hit the target.
programme.sub-title: The Badder A Guy, The More Villainous He Is

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Lupin gets called out to New York where he rescues a girl hunted by an organization called Red Spider. Lupin does everything he can to help the poor girl suffering from amnesia; he tries hypnosis on her but to no avail, he gets hypnotized instead.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Old man Piccolo had taught Lupin the art of thievery 15 years ago. Learning that his widowed wife had all of her belongings impounded by the police, Lupin promises her to get them all back.
programme.sub-title: The Merry Widow and the Robber's Quartette

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Lupin and crew sneak into Peking's Imperial Palace Museum to steal Emperor Shi's jade Mahjong set, but winds up getting chased by a gang.
programme.sub-title: Operation INVADER at the Great Wall of China

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Look who is flying above New York; it's Superman! All he does is fly around, but the town is in a panic because of his performance. In the meantime, a lot of banks get robbed.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Lupin steals a statue called the Stone Child from the Metropolitan Art Museum; he and Fujiko make their getaway in a Cessna, but they crash at the Bermuda Triangle. They encounter a ghost ship at this grave of many ships and planes.
programme.sub-title: From the Ghost Ship with Love

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Foodie and gourmet aficionado Baron Gourmel says he wants to eat Lupin's brain. He claims he'd offer his own 70-million dollar jewelry collection to anyone who could capture Lupin. Fujiko hears of it and informs Lupin right away.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Lupin III learns that his grandfather Arsène Lupin's secret treasures are buried in his grave. Lupin learns of its location with Fujiko's microfilm.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Lupin and Jigen are surrounded, as usual, as they are trying to escape after a jewelry theft. But somebody shoots at Zenigata and hits him dead on. Lupin learns of the even the next morning in the papers, and Fujiko and Goemon get implicated.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: The prime minister of the Duchy of Blanco has a one-of-a-kind gold coin of Hannibal hidden in his chest; well, Lupin and crew are after it. Amidst their scheming, Jigen is challenged to a duel with a man named Stoneman.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: The prime minister of France has run up a ridiculous tab with Maxim of Paris, and orders the Louvre Museum proprietor to sell a painting to cover his bill. But the proprietor doesn't want to let it go, and takes the painting out of the museum.
programme.sub-title: The Ultra Operation in the Train

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Lupin recieves a letter about Marie Antoinette's jeweled crown, and sneaks into the palace of Versailles. A young man called Oscar appears, the sender of the letter.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Lupin was told by Fujiko to steal a pistol of the Wilhem family worth 500 million pounds. Meanwhile, a man named Jim Benkei, a giant of a man who's stirred troubled in London, steals Jigen's favorite Magnum ...

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Lupin is after the various jewels at the World Fair in Los Angeles. Lupin learns from Fujiko that a man named Harry Satler is also after the jewels, so he decides to go see who this guy is. The man he meets is a wizened old man…
programme.sub-title: The Wolf Looked at an Angel!

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Pestered by Fujiko, Lupin has to steal a golden bed that was originally made by Louis XIV for Josephine. He makes a plan with Jigen and Goemon, but the owner of the bed, Morgan, is a formidable opponent who has WWII military experience.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: The Heike Clan and Minamoto Clan once battled on Devil's Head Island at the inland sea of Seto; Fujiko and Lupin go there to find out about the details behind the legend of the battle.
programme.sub-title: The Mystery of Demon's Head Island

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Vivian dreams of becoming a star some day, but her auditions are a bust. She thinks of using Lupin to become famous; she makes Lupin engage in thievery, and informs reporters to be at the site to catch him in the act.
programme.sub-title: A Cat for You! Dried Bonito for Me!

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Louis XIV and Marie Antoinette's Hope Diamond has brought much misfortune on its possessors. The diamond is now safeguarded by a maximum security device. Fujiko provokes Lupin to steal that diamond.
programme.sub-title: The Wedding Ring is a Cursed Trap

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Lupin and crew go to a hot spring. Lupin and Jigen relax while Goemon trains at the cliffs. A girl manifests to Goemon and captures Goemon's heart. However, the girl is seeking the secret of his sword, for her swordsmith grandfather…

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Lupin has to battle a hitman called Tiger. Lupin tries to dodge him, but Tiger is one step ahead of him. Lupin keeps trying to escape him but Tiger is relentless; he has a way of disappearing and appearing at will.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Lupin and friends go to have fun at the horse race track, but winning isn't as easy as stealing. Lupin notices two people who are winning big money hand over fist, and gets suspicious.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Catherine rescues Lupin and Jigen, who are pursued by Zenigata as usual. She's an old acquaintance of Jigen's, and provokes Jigen to steal a 140-karat diamond from her own mansion.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Wolf and Rose are a cool hitmen duo with the ambition of rising to the top of the hitman business by killing Lupin. They capture Goemon and torture him to confess about Lupin's weaknesses. Lupin learns that Goemon is in danger.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: The chief of the police department accused of mismanagement on Lupin's release, hit the prime minister out of anger and was dismissed. Zenigata thinks that Lupin is the only arrest to avenge the chief's death, and starts an operation.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: The painting "The First Supper" hides clues to an heirloom that Christ received from Virgin Mary. This painting has been kept by the clan of Judah for generations, and a woman named Nova knows where the painting is hidden.
programme.sub-title: The Secret of the First Supper

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: The Mona Lisa never leaves the Louvre Museum. Arsène Lupin tried unsuccessfully to steal her and Lupin III wants her for his collection, however, and fireworks ignite between him and Zenigata in charge of security.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: On New Years Eve, Lupin is after is the Golden Treasure Ship at Mount Horai. It's said that the Seven Lucky Gods conferred this treasure, which is shown in public only once a year when the New Year's bell rings at the belfry of Kohoji Temple.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: As usual, Lupin is tossed to and fro by Fujiko. But a man named Buckingham comes to him and sells him "disguise chewing gum" for 50,000 dollars.
programme.sub-title: The Strategy of the Chewing Gum Disguise

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: The island of Rabaul has many remains of Japanese casualties of the Pacific War. It's said that Captain Cook's secret treasure is hidden there, worth 1-billion pounds. Lupin and gang are after this treasure but they get attacked!

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Lupin and gang break into the Bank of Stockholm but as usual, Fujiko tries to take the money all for herself. Lupin goes after her but she gets injured in an avalanche. She confesses to Lupin about the location of her most precious treasure…

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Lupin and friends search a month for the pirate Kid's treasure, but they are thwarted by an underground organization called the Red Ghost. Knowing something is afoot, Lupin sends Fujiko and Goemon to investigate.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Lupin finds a piece of paper in a silk hat, an heirloom of Arsène Lupin. It's information regarding an opal statue of Venus, and since Lupin figures its ownership is his birthright, he heads to Gregoire's castle.

programme.title: Cyborg, (1989, Action)
programme.desc: Jean-Claude Van Damme stars in this adrenaline-charged sci-fi thriller as Gibson Rickenbacker, the future's most fearsome warrior. In the wake of a plague, Rickenbacker must rescue the only person who can develop a vaccine and save civilization.

programme.title: The Crow, (1994, Action)
programme.desc: Visually stunning and action-packed, this hit movie, based on the comic book series, follows the return from the grave of a young rock guitarist who, along with his fiancée, is brutally killed by a ruthless gang of criminals.

programme.title: Total Recall, (1990, Thriller)
programme.desc: It's 2084 A.D. and Doug Quaid is haunted by recurring dreams about journeying to Earths closest planetary neighbor, Mars.

programme.title: Skyline, (2010, Science fiction)
programme.desc: Jarrod and Elaine travel to Los Angeles to meet his friend Terry and his wife Candice. Terry gives a party in his apartment for Jarrod. The next morning, the group is awakened by beams of light. The group of friends try to escape from the alien invaders.

programme.title: 30 Days of Night: Dark Days, (2010, Zombies)
programme.desc: Almost a year has passed since Barrow, Alaska’s population was decimated by vampires. Stella, mourning her husband’s murder, has been travelling the world trying to convince others that vampires exist.

programme.title: Total Recall, (1990, Thriller)
programme.desc: It's 2084 A.D. and Doug Quaid is haunted by recurring dreams about journeying to Earths closest planetary neighbor, Mars.

programme.title: The Crow, (1994, Action)
programme.desc: Visually stunning and action-packed, this hit movie, based on the comic book series, follows the return from the grave of a young rock guitarist who, along with his fiancée, is brutally killed by a ruthless gang of criminals.

programme.title: Cloverfield, (2007, Sci-Fi Horror)
programme.desc: Five young New Yorkers face a life or death struggle in order to escape from the city when a monster the size of a skyscraper suddenly appears.

programme.title: Attack the Block, (2011, Science fiction)
programme.desc: ATTACK THE BLOCK is a fast, funny, frightening action adventure movie that pits a teen street gang against an invasion of savage alien monsters. It turns a crazy mix of tough street kids into a team of kick ass heroes.

programme.title: Barbed Wire, (1952, Western)
programme.desc: In 1878, Gene Autry is a cattle buyer who tries to settle a battle between the cattlemen and homesteaders, when the latter are worked up into a feverish pitch by unscrupulous landowner Steve Rutledge.

programme.title: Apache Country, (1952, Western)
programme.desc: Cavalry scouts Gene Autry & Pat Buttram are ordered to break up a ring which uses raids to cover up its activities. Carolina Cotton assists Gene and Pat, while seeking revenge against the gang leader.

programme.title: War Of The Wildcats, (1943, Western)
programme.desc: A confident oil baron and a determined cowboy are rivals for Oklahoma land and oil rights, and for the love of a pretty schoolteacher. The cowboy acts on behalf of the Indians, on whose land the oil is discovered.

programme.title: Fort Massacre, (1958, Western)
programme.desc: Joel McCrea gives a compelling performance as a cavalry sergeant apparently leading his men to safety, but actually slowly going mad in an insane attempt to avenge an Indian massacre.

programme.title: Sam Whiskey, (1969, Western)
programme.desc: Welcome to America's Wild - and very wacky - West! Burt Reynolds, Clint Walker, Ossie Davis and Angie Dickinson star in this tongue-in-cheek tale of love, lust and larceny as an amiable con-artist is hire by a sexy widow to break into the U.S. Mint.

programme.title: The Halliday Brand, (1957, Western)
programme.desc: A western about a young man's (Joseph Cotten) disillusionment with his father (Ward Bond), a corrupt sheriff. When his dad turns away from the lynching of his sister's lover, the boy rebels and his father declares him an 'outlaw.'

programme.title: The Horse Soldiers, (1959, Military & War Action)
programme.desc: John Wayne, Constance Towers and William Holden star in this 1863, fact-based story about a Union mission to destroy a railroad junction deep within Confederate territory.

programme.title: Dakota, (1945, Western)
